roleset.name: block, avoid, causing to change course so as to miss

example.name: basic usage
example.text: ...a topic of intense speculation on Wall Street since Mr. Stookey deflected dividend questions in a Sept. 29 meeting with analysts.
example.arg: in a Sept. 29 meeting with analysts.

example.name: both args
example.text: Still, it's possible his deflection of the compliment was warranted.

roleset.note: DEFLECT-V NOTES: Might take instrument? (from deflect.01-v)
DEFLECTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5, deflect.01. No VNcls. (from deflection.01-n)
